places.description: My study abroad in France was amazing! Here is why...

I went solo to a wine, cheese, and charcuterie lunch and absolutely loved it. The wines were very nice, and Neil, our sommelier was so knowledgeable and fun. It was a terrific small group of 5, and we were in a great wine library at the back. If I could transport this room to my home, I'd be thrilled. Highly recommended.
